content.rendered:
Directed by Bejoy Nambiar.

Written by Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Abhijat Joshi. Bejoy Nambiar. Natasha Sahgal. Shubhra Swarup. Abhijeet Shirish Deshpande. Gazal Dhaliwal.

Cast Amitabh Bachchan(Pandit Omkarnath Dhar). Farhan Akhtar(Daanish Ali). Aditi Rao Hydari(Ruhana Ali). Manav Kaul(Yazaad Qureshi). Neil Nitin Mukesh(Wazir). John Abraham(S.P). Anjum Sharma(Sartaj). Prakash Belawadi(DCP). Murli Sharma(Mahesh). Nasir Khan(Rameez (as Nassir Quazi)). Seema Pahwa(Pammi). Nishigandha Wad(Ruhana’s Mother (as Dr. Nishigandha Wad)). Saachi Tiwari(Noorie). Vaidehi Parshurami(Nina Dhar).Vivekanand Singh.Ajay Arya. Avtar Gill(Commissioner G.B. Singh). Gargi Patel(Roohi’s Caretaker).Lakshay Kumar. Mazel Vyas(Roohi).Jasleen Singh.Jasveer. Reem Shaikh(Kid Playing Chess With Amitabh Bachchan / Farhan Akhtar).Kedar.Hardik Ruparel.Manpreet.Satakshy Nandy.Hemabharti Palani.Pooja Kadam.Akshata Joshi.Fawas Ameer.Megna Nambiar.Tony Pious.Purnendrakumar Meshram. Amruth((as Amruth P.)).Snigdha Prabhakar.Nihal Pasha.Shaila Tike.Sylvester Mardi.Anandita Ghosh.Parth Bharadwaj.Sameera Kumar.Vinod Nanaware . Sachin Danai(ATS Officer). Deepak Kalra(Family Doctor). Diana Pinto(Yazaad Qureshi’s Receptionist). Abhimanyu Sarkar(Commando head)

Language Hindi.

Producers Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Yogesh Ishwar. Kartik R. Iyer. Priyesh Kaushik. Suchit Mukherjee. Rohit Phale. Navmeet Singh.

Production Vinod Chopra Productions.
